title: Executive Order 6554-Amendment of Executive Order No. 6440, of November 18, 1933
content: The provisions of Executive Order No. 6440, dated November 18, 1933, prescribing rates of compensation of Government employees in emergency agencies not subject to the Classification Act and acts amendatory thereof, are hereby extended to include, in addition to the agencies named in that order, all other existing emergency agencies and those hereafter created, the rates of compensation of the officers and employees of which are fixed without regard to the Classification Act of 1923, as amended.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6554-Amendment of Executive Order No. 6440, of November 18, 1933 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362311
